q: Page replaces Google CEO Eric Schmidt , who will become executive chairman. In a blog post, Eric Schmidt said Page would merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. He is often parodied in Michael Jackson culture, and was described by the The Times journalist Minette Marrin as representing, along with his fellow judges on Britain's Got Talent, the heartless, thoughtless and superficial the flotsam and jetsam of the polluted seas of celebrity that is likely to sink without trace into toxic foam . Simon Cowell is known for combining activities in the television and music industries, having promoted singles and records for various artists, including television personalities. San Francisco- Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne says the company will run a two-minute commercial in the third quarter of the Super Bowl on Sunday, as part of the company's efforts to recast its image. I won't tell you what it's about but its worth watching, Sergio Marchionne said at a forum sponsored by JD Power at a hotel here ahead of the National Automobile Dealers Association three-day convention.
